text:
HomeAway | Austin | Data Scientist II (other roles available too) | Full Time | Onsite HomeAway (part of Expedia group) is a large online vacation rental marketplace based in Austin. We currently have a data science team of >30 people working on lots of interesting problems.

We're looking to hire an experienced Data Scientist to work on search relevance/ranking and/or recommender systems or potentially query suggestion. This role is a great place for anyone with a background in learning to rank, sponsored search/ad ctr prediction, computational advertising or recommender systems in general.

Me: tbrady [at symbol] homeaway [dot] com

Job posting: https://www.homeaway.com/careers/job/irc12444-data-scientist...
